sentences.en: Along with research went thorough, the computing element could increase correspondingly.
sentences.cn: 随着研究问题的深入, 计算单元类型会相应的扩充.

sentences.en: As his political stature has shrunk, he has grown correspondingly more dependent on the army.
sentences.cn: 随着政治声望的降低，他变得更加依赖军队了。

sentences.en: Correspondingly, any complete electrochemical cell can be separated into two hypothetical half - cells.
sentences.cn: 同样, 任一完整的化学电池也可分为两个假设的半电池.

sentences.en: Correspondingly, financial risks have been enlarged, and financial crimes have abruptly increased.
sentences.cn: 与此相对应, 金融风险加大, 金融犯罪激增.

sentences.en: Correspondingly, the idea that the big bang was'small " is misleading.
sentences.cn: 而大霹雳很 [ 小 ] 这个观念也是会引起误会的.

sentences.en: Failure to ration carefully becomes correspondingly less important.
sentences.cn: 不去细致地安排日粮,也不太要紧.

sentences.en: For higher accuracy, this ratio must be correspondingly higher.
sentences.cn: 对于更高的准确度, 这个比率必须相应地更高.

sentences.en: If the outflow falls the average duration of unemployment will correspondingly rise.
sentences.cn: 若流出人数下降,则失业的平均持续期将相应上升.

sentences.en: Nevertheless, this will not correspondingly encourage the construction of new housing.
sentences.cn: 尽管如此, 这种做法并不能相应地激励新住宅的建设.

sentences.en: Reducing the current, we can correspondingly decrease the speed of the motor.
sentences.cn: 如果减少电流, 电动机的转速就会相应地降低.

sentences.en: So the two countries may take restriction measures and correspondingly counteractions.
sentences.cn: 为此,中美两国分别采取了限制措施和应对措施.

sentences.en: The auxiliary contact can be actuated correspondingly along with the main contact.
sentences.cn: 辅助触头随主触头相应动作.
讲话的语言也相应地变得更加强硬.

sentences.en: To optimize the burning operating mode and improve combustion efficiency correspondingly.
sentences.cn: 优化燃烧工况、应提高燃烧效率.

sentences.en: With four athletes the positions will be assigned correspondingly.
sentences.cn: 四位选手时则依此原则安排发射位置.

words.tran_cn: 相当的，相应的；一致的；通信的

trans.tran_en: You use correspondingly when describing a situation which is closely connected with one you have just mentioned or is similar to it
